QAPair.Question: What is (are) Gastrointestinal disorders - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations provide information on gastrointestinal disorders: American College of Gastroenterology -- gi.org , International Foundation for Functional Gastrointestinal Disorders (IFFGD) -- iffgd.org , American Liver Foundation -- liverfoundation.org , National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases -- www.niddk.nih.gov/health-information/digestive-diseases ,
